data.description: Elementary aspects of Lagrange theory of fields and field quantization; Bose, Fermi and Pauli operators; interaction of fields; quantum theory of damping and fluctuations; applications to lasers, nonlinear optics, and quantum optics. Knowledge of lasers [such as PHYSICS 546] and graduate-level electromagnetics [such asE C E 740orPHYSICS 721] strongly encouraged.
data.title: QUANTUM ELECTRONICS
